attributes.action: Dual carriageway A38 saltash Carkeel roundabout to Trerulefoot roundabout
attributes.background: Too many serious accidents resulting in death or serious injury along this stretch of road. A high level of traffic at all times of the day. Business suffer costly losses when main road into cornwall is closed for several hours. Alternative routes not an option.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
